definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: The discrepancy in intercourse outlooks would inevitably results in different globalization theories.
sentences.chinese: 不同的交往觀必然會有不同的全球化理路。

sentences.english: Chuang Tzu follows Lao Tzu and he also explains the Tao with "non-bing".
sentences.chinese: 莊子沿循老子之理路，同樣以“無”論“道”。

sentences.english: The fifth part combines the theoretical points of the transformation of the educational paradigms.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分對教育範式轉換的理路進行了綜合。

definition: doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
way of proceeding/approach (to a task etc)
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
